name: Anton Weiss
description: Ant(on) Weiss is a DevOps Evangelist and Enabler. He's been architecting software delivery processes at large and small companies for the last 15 years. Today he's the CEO and Principal Consultant at Otomato. When not evangelising for Codefresh, he's deeply involved with technical training and public speaking.

@graph.name: Anton Weiss
@graph.description: Ant(on) Weiss is a DevOps Evangelist and Enabler. He's been architecting software delivery processes at large and small companies for the last 15 years. Today he's the CEO and Principal Consultant at Otomato. When not evangelising for Codefresh, he's deeply involved with technical training and public speaking.
